amendment.description: To require certain overdue reports relating to maritime security to be transmitted to the Congress within 90 days, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3901 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10355) To require certain overdue reports relating to maritime security to be transmitted to the Congress within 90 days, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3901 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Hollings.
